block.p: The New York Red Bulls are close to completing a deal to trade the second-year defender Marvell Wynne to Toronto F.C. for a draft pick and other considerations. The Red Bulls last year made a trade to secure the top pick in the league draft and took Wynne No. 1 over all out of U.C.L.A. Mo Johnston was the team's coach at the time; he is now the coach of the Canadian expansion team. The Red Bulls on Tuesday acquired striker Juan Pablo Ángel from Aston Villa of the English Premier League and need to free a spot on their 18-man roster.
